topics.title: Describe a Happy Memory
topics.prompt: Talk about a happy moment you experienced recently.
topics.hint: 請描述一個你最近經歷過的快樂時刻，可以說明地點、人物和感受。
topics.sample: Last week, I went to the park with my friends. We played games and laughed a lot. It was a very fun and happy day.

topics.title: Explain What Friendship Means to You
topics.prompt: Describe what friendship means in your life.
topics.hint: 說說友誼對你來說的重要性，可以包含朋友帶給你的感覺和回憶。
topics.sample: Friendship means trust and support to me. My friends help me when I am sad, and we always share happy times together.

topics.title: Talk About a Time You Felt Hope
topics.prompt: Share a story when you felt hopeful about something.
topics.hint: 談談你什麼時候感覺到希望，可以說明當時的情況和未來的期待。
topics.sample: When I applied for my new job, I felt hopeful. I believed I could do well and learn many new things. That hope gave me confidence.

topics.title: Describe a Place You Love
topics.prompt: Describe a place that makes you feel happy and safe.
topics.hint: 描述一個你喜歡的地方，可以說說地點、環境和你為什麼喜歡它。
topics.sample: I love my grandmother's house because it is peaceful. The garden is full of flowers, and I always feel calm and happy there.

topics.title: Talk About a Difficult Moment
topics.prompt: Describe a time when you felt sad or faced a challenge.
topics.hint: 說說你曾經感到難過或遇到困難的一次經驗，可以分享怎麼克服的。
topics.sample: Last year, I failed an important exam. I felt very sad and disappointed. But I studied harder and passed the next time.

topics.title: Describe the Meaning of Love
topics.prompt: Explain what love means to you in your own words.
topics.hint: 用你自己的話說明愛的意義，可以包括愛的感覺和表現方式。
topics.sample: Love means caring for someone deeply. It is about showing kindness, supporting each other, and feeling happy together.

topics.title: Describe How You Show Kindness
topics.prompt: Talk about a time you helped someone or showed kindness.
topics.hint: 分享你幫助別人或表現友善的經歷，可以詳細說明情況和對方的反應。
topics.sample: Once, I helped an elderly person carry groceries. She smiled and thanked me, and I felt good because I made her day easier.

topics.title: Imagine a Perfect Day
topics.prompt: Describe what your perfect day would look like.
topics.hint: 想像你理想的一天，可以包括活動、地點、與誰一起度過等。
topics.sample: My perfect day would start with a sunny morning at the beach. I would swim, eat ice cream, and spend time with my family.

topics.title: Tell a Story About Meeting New People
topics.prompt: Describe an experience where you met new people and made friends.
topics.hint: 談談你遇見新朋友的經驗，怎麼認識他們和你們做了什麼。
topics.sample: At a summer camp, I met people from different countries. We shared our cultures, played games, and became good friends.

topics.title: Describe What Makes You Smile
topics.prompt: Talk about things or events that often make you smile.
topics.hint: 說說生活中哪些事情讓你常常微笑，可以是人、活動或回憶。
topics.sample: Seeing my dog happy always makes me smile. Also, when my friends tell jokes, I laugh a lot.
